items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.
items.title: fix2015/no-sleep-app: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: Node.js + Express Boilerplate with GraphQL A clean and extensible boilerplate for building scalable Node.js applications using Express and GraphQL. Features Node.js + Express: Lightweight and fast backend framework. GraphQL API: Built-in support for creating flexible and efficient APIs with GraphQL.
items.title: Rajesh4013/graphql-nodeexpress-boilerplate: Node.js + Express Boilerplate with GraphQL  A clean and extensible boilerplate for building scalable Node.js applications using Express and GraphQL.  Features Node.js + Express: Lightweight and fast backend framework. GraphQL API: Built-in support for creating flexible and efficient APIs with GraphQL.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.
items.title: ade1963/tg-mini-tools: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.

items.content_html: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.
items.title: exidz/zustand-fsm: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.
